Posts.Content: tmcfizer wrote: I have less than a week to decide on which surgery to have, lumpectomy w/ radiation or bilateral mastectomy. The more I research, the more confused I am and anxious I'll make the wrong choice. I'm freaking out about having to choose. What if I choose wrong? Why one over another? Dx 8/12/2015, IDC, Left, <1cm, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy versus Mastectomy- How to Decide? tmcfizer Lumpie
